Attributes.description: The analysis and design of the elements of transportation facilities in development of transport technology; vehicle motion; vehicle/pavement interaction; elements of road design; principles of queuing and roadway capacity; rail transit performance and capacity analysis; economics as applied to transport.
Attributes.date_buildings: Term: 2, Days: Tue Thu, Start Time: 9:30, End Time: 11:00, Building: P., Room: A.
